title: Opposites Attract
lyrics:
[Verse 1: Paula Abdul & 
The Wild Pair
]
Baby, it seems we never ever agree
You like the movies and I like TV
I take things serious and you take 'em light
I go to bed early 
and I party all night
[Verse 2: Paula Abdul, 
The Wild Pair
, 
Both
]
Our friends are sayin'
 
we ain't gonna last
'Cause I move slowly 
and baby, I'm fast
I like it quiet 
and I love to shout
But when we get together, it just all works out
[Chorus: Paula Abdul, 
The Wild Pair
, 
Both
]
I take two steps forward, 
I take two steps back
We come together
 'cause opposites attract
And you know it ain't fiction, 
just a natural fact
We come together
 'cause opposites attract
[Verse 3: Paula Abdul & 
The Wild Pair
]
Who'd-a thought 
we could be lovers?
She makes the bed
 and he steals the covers
She likes it neat
 and he makes a mess
I take it easy, 
baby, I get obsessed
[Verse 4: Paula Abdul, 
The Wild Pair
, 
Both
]
She's got the money
 and he's always broke
I don't like cigarettes 
and I like to smoke
Things in common?
 
There just ain't a one!
But when we get together, we have nothin' but fun
[Chorus: Paula Abdul, 
The Wild Pair
, 
Both
]
I take two steps forward, 
I take two steps back
We come together 'cause opposites attract
And you know it ain't fiction, 
just a natural fact
We come together
 'cause opposites attract
A two steps forward, 
a two steps back
We come together
 'cause opposites attract
And you know it ain't fiction, 
just a natural fact
We come together 'cause opposites attract

You know it, baby, baby
We come together
We come together
[Verse 5: Paula Abdul & 
The Wild Pair
]
Baby, ain't it somethin' how we lasted this long?
You and me provin' everyone wrong
Don't think we'll ever get our differences patched
Don't really matter 'cause we're perfectly matched
[Chorus: Paula Abdul, 
The Wild Pair
, 
Both
]
I take two steps forward, 
I take two steps back
We come together 'cause opposites attract
And you know it ain't fiction, 
just a natural fact
We come together
 'cause opposites attract
A two steps forward, 
a two steps back
We come together
 'cause opposites attract
And you know it ain't fiction, 
just a natural fact
We come together 'cause opposites attract
[Outro: Paula Abdul, 
The Wild Pair
, 
Both
]
Two steps forward, two steps back
Two steps back
We come together 'cause opposites, opposites attract
It ain't fiction,
 
you know it's a fact
It's a fact
We come together 'cause opposites, opposites
Two steps forward, two steps back
A two steps back
Opposites attract
We go together
We go together
Two steps forward, two steps back
A two steps back
